input.sentences: here is the beginning of the annual town beach party .
the cummunity loves to take part in the tag of war game .
the crowd this year is larger then ever and everyone is cheering for their favorite team .
look even the dogs are getting in on the game .
with all the game playing it is now time to do my favorite game and that is eating .
output.sentences: The town was beginning to organize a party.
Soon the event was ready and offered many games like tug a war and tag.
The team that had a larger number of people were the favorite to win the game.
Some people even brought their dogs, which got to join in on some games.
Everyone enjoyed the time outdoors playing games and having free food.
